name: Golden Sword
description:
Golden Sword

An entry for #WeeklyGameJam week 106 with the theme "Oh No!".

Your kingdom is in the brink of falling. As the last soldier standing you must uphold the honor by protecting the last remnant of the kingdom, The Golden Sword. It may be too late, it may be hopeless, but it is your last duty as a soldier.

Controls:

  • WASD: Move
  • Left Click / Space: Attack
  • Escape: Pause

Pro-tips:

  • Stay near the sword to regenerate hp in-between the waves
  • Consider your position when attacking the enemy

Credits:

  • Used sprites by 0x72 (https://0x72.itch.io/) with modifications
  • Theme music taken from https://freepd.com
